coreservlets

Class courseDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • coreservlets.courseDAO

  • public class courseDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    courseDAO is a Data Access Object with 3 classes to get all courses in the database, getting a user specified course and inserting a course into the database

      static java.util.ArrayList<Course> getAllCourses()
      getAllCourses returns all courses in the Database.

      getCourse returns an ArrayList of courses the user specifies
      static void insertCourse(Course c)
      insertCourse allows users to add a course to the database
